metadata.feature_description: Reorder templates in hierarchy by dragging and dropping them to new positions

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access Templates panel and verify drag functionality

steps.action: Navigate to Manage > Templates in Persona Bar
steps.expected: Page Templates panel opens with list of templates displayed
steps.actual: Page Templates panel opened but displayed error: 'There was an error retrieving your content. Please check your internet connection.' Server returned HTTP 500 Internal Server Error. No templates were loaded.

steps.action: Retry navigation to Templates panel after page refresh
steps.expected: Templates list loads successfully showing available templates with drag handles
steps.actual: Templates panel remained empty after multiple attempts. The GetPageTemplates API endpoint consistently returned 500 Internal Server Error. No template items were displayed to test drag and drop functionality.

issues: Templates API endpoint (GetPageTemplates) returns HTTP 500 Internal Server Error
No templates are displayed in the Page Templates panel
Unable to test drag and drop functionality due to server-side error preventing template data retrieval

observations: Code review shows drag and drop is implemented using jQuery UI Sortable with handle 'span.drag-area' (templatesHierarchy.js:885)
Drag handle visibility is controlled by search state - hidden when search keyword is not empty (Templates.html:93)
MovePage API is called when templates are dropped to persist the new position
The Templates panel UI loads correctly (header, search box, Add Template button visible) but the template list content fails to load due to API errors
